title: I Have $30,000 in Credit Card Debt and $69,000 Left on My Mortgage. Is a Home Equity Loan a Mistake?
full_text: I Have $30,000 in Credit Card Debt and $69,000 Left on My Mortgage. Is a Home Equity Loan a Mistake?. Quick Summary Using home equity to pay off credit cards can feel like progress, especially when someone has $30,000 in high-interest debt, a 715 credit score....
